title.rendered: Metropolis Recognizes Eldorado Stone European Ledge as a Transformative Architectural Solution

content.rendered:
The European Ledge profile is featured in the March issue of Metropolis magazine in an article titled, “Productsphere: Transformative Architectural Solutions.” The article features an image of Glacier European Ledge and is marked as one of 17 products that “highlight the transformation, both outside and in, of architectural design, and offer inspiration for any green project.” The feature can be found on pages 152 and 153.

Learn more about European Ledge here.
